ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Start_Welcome_Call_Email_Reminders__c), ( PRIORVALUE(Start_Welcome_Call_Email_Reminders__c) = True ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck the 'Start Welcome Call Email Reminders' field.
